comment.author: 8139976@N03
comment._content: This is really a mix of Germans and Austrians, e.g., General Paulus von Stolzmann (home.comcast.net/~jcviser/akb/stolzmann.htm) k.u.k. Oberstleutnant Alfred Purtscher (www.weltkriege.at/Obristen/Purtscher%20Alfred/Oberst%20Pu...) (books.google.com/books?id=eI0uIkzUJGoC&pg=PA243&l...)

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The person identified as "Capt. V. Boeh u Polach" is Captain von Bock und Polach.I haven't found which von Bock und Polach this captain is, but he isn't one of the prominent ones named on the German Wikipedia page, as they were not in the army in 1915. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bock_und_Polach

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: xiphophilos and artolog: thank you for the background information and links.  We will update the record.
